uploadVideoForm.useDifferentVideo:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to select a different video URL for upload.
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal → Upload Video Form
**When Users See This**: After a video thumbnail is loaded, allowing the user to change the selected video.
**Technical Context**: Part of the video upload form. Clicking this button changes the input field back to allow a new URL.
**Current English**: "Use different video"
uploadVideoTextInput.pasteYourVideoUrlYo:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the video URL input field.
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal → Upload Video Form
**When Users See This**: When the video upload form is displayed.
**Technical Context**: Label for the `video_url` input. This field is read-only if a video is already pre-filled.
**Current English**: "PASTE YOUR VIDEO URL (YOUTUBE)"
uploadVideoTextInput.videoTitle:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the video title input field.
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal → Upload Video Form
**When Users See This**: When the video upload form is displayed.
**Technical Context**: Label for the `title` input.
**Current English**: "Video title"
uploadVideoTextInput.enterTheVideoTitle:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for the video title input field.
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal → Upload Video Form
**When Users See This**: When the video upload form is displayed and the title field is empty.
**Technical Context**: Placeholder for the `title` input.
**Current English**: "Enter the video title"
uploadVideoForm.isTheVideoYoursOrSomeone:
**Functional Purpose**: Legend for a radio button group asking about video authorship.
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal → Upload Video Form
**When Users See This**: When the video upload form is displayed.
**Technical Context**: Legend for the `submitter_is_author` radio button group.
**Current English**: "IS THE VIDEO YOURS OR SOMEONE ELSE'S?"
uploadVideoForm.mine:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for a radio button indicating the user is the author of the video.
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal → Upload Video Form
**When Users See This**: When the video upload form is displayed.
**Technical Context**: Label for the `submitter_is_author` radio button with value `true`.
**Current English**: "Mine"
uploadVideoForm.someoneElse:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for a radio button indicating someone else is the author of the video.
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal → Upload Video Form
**When Users See This**: When the video upload form is displayed.
**Technical Context**: Label for the `submitter_is_author` radio button with value `false`.
**Current English**: "Someone else"
uploadVideoForm.submitVideo:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to submit the video upload form.
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal → Upload Video Form
**When Users See This**: When the video upload form is displayed and ready for submission.
**Technical Context**: Primary action button for submitting the form.
**Current English**: "Submit video"
